identified-content.org: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE OF AMERICA INC

block.p: As a traveler and a biker, I was interested in your table of prices for shipping bicycles by air (Travel Advisory, July 23). An even easier and less costly method involves shipping by United Parcel or other similar carrier. Pick up a used bicycle shipping carton from a local bike store (they are always discarding the cartons), and disassemble wheels, pedals and handlebars, which requires a minimum of tools. Carriers will deliver the bike directly to your destination and will pick it up at the end of your stay to return it home. I have shipped this way from Long Island to the Florida Keys for under $20 each way. MILFORD CRANDALL Amagansett, L.I.
